name: Protector (Matt1551)
description:
Overview

Protector is an FPS 3D game, that included 4 kinds of weapons. (Bosses will drop new weapons.) When you kill all the enemies in the level, you will win the game.  All the accessible houses in the game are not accessible to the enemies, And all the houses will have a health cases to heal yourself. So try to use those houses to kill the enemies.

Background:

Your homeland was invaded by robot monsters, they occupied the body of huge spiders and started attacking your village. But at the same time, you found a good weapon so you decided to protect your home.

Control Note

When you pause the game and back to the main menu, you will be stuck when you try to restart the level. You can press "Tab" wtice on your keyboard in the game to fix this problem.

Info

LAB 01

Student name: Yudong Gao
